silly_mentor_war: I, uh... I wanna let you know that I know everything's scary right now.
Not to mention the... well, everything?

I dunno! I'm not good at these weird adulty talks. But I wanna let you know that even if no warriors in your life have your back, I do. I might not be good at talking seriously, but I wanna hear what you have to say.
Here, I gotcha a pebble. It's a fun shape and your favorite color, so it reminded me of you!
sc_living_8: [t_c sits down with a sigh, looking almost alive under the moon's glow.]
Remember when the biggest worry was just a border skirmish? Seems like cycles ago.
war_kitten_H1: [t_c's eyes hold an unnerving understanding as you limp around camp.]
You are injured. Why hasn't r_m treated you yet?
{VERB/r_m/Are/Is} {PRONOUN/r_m/subject} busy? That's fine. I'm not a cleric, but I can help!
war_app_H1: Does war really mean anything? This just seems petty, but tm_n keeps telling me it's a lesson to be learned.
If it was true... I wish the lessons were less bloody and painful.

I'm sorry to bother you with my thoughts, y_c. I just needed to speak to someone that wasn't a puddle or tm_n. {PRONOUN/tm_n/subject/CAP} {VERB/tm_n/hover/hovers}, and now it makes me uncomfortable beyond belief.
It would take a long time before I would be comfortable with some slugcat standing behind me.
war_kitten_H2: No one is telling me anything! I know something bad is happening, I just know it.
war_queen_H1: [t_c looks tired, yet {PRONOUN/t_c/subject}{VERB/t_c/'re/'s} up and about watching over the pups.]
War is so unpredictable. I need to watch over them, I need to.
I always feel like the moment I turn away, something is going to happen.
It feels irrational but... is it, really?
war_kitten_H3: [You find t_c mumbling to {PRONOUN/t_c/self} in the nursery.]
This is not scary, not at all! Every slugcat is going to come back safe...
Breathe in and out, in and out, like r_q says.
war_kitten_H4: Why can't l_n just call off the war? Why is it taking so long to stop it?
No... It feels unfair. r_d says we should be talking about our feelings instead of fighting about it!
That's what w_cClan and c_nClan are doing, right? Fighting about something?
war_kitten_H5: I am going to be as big and strong as r_w! So I can help!
war_pregnant_AJ: I'm excited for my pups to be born, I really am, but ...
[t_c casts a worried glance towards w_cClan camp.]
I can't help but worry what will become of them.
war_silly_AJ: [t_c is fruitlessly trying to make the warriors laugh.]
C'mon, guys! Hey, how about this one? A w_cClan slugcat walks into a creek ...
[One of the warriors tosses a stick at {PRONOUN/t_c/object}, snapping at {PRONOUN/t_c/object} to give it a rest.]
[It seems like no one in c_nClan is in much of a laughing mood. Defeated, t_c slinks back to {PRONOUN/t_c/poss} nest.]
war_silly_AJ1: Try dealing with t_l_brooding when the last of {PRONOUN/t_l_brooding/poss} favorite prey is stolen from the pile. Now that's scary.
unlawful_war1: [t_c slashes at the ground menacingly, mumbling to {PRONOUN/t_c/self} about the war.]
If any of those lizard-hearts put even one whisker over the border, I'll kill their leader myself as many times as it takes... They'll learn not to mess with c_nClan.
unlawful_warGuy1: I expect you to do anything we ask of you, y_c.
Even if it goes against the code, we will not let those yeek-dung eating w_cClan slugcats hurt our pups.
war_mckitten_H1: Huh? I don't need to tell you nothin'!
You're too young anyway, I'm not gonna be responsible for a slugpup's nightmares.
[With a flick of a tail, t_c huffs and turns away.]
war_mckitten_H2: [You ask t_c what war is and why every slugcat is making a big deal about it.]
That sounds like something your {PRONOUN/y_p/parent} should explain to you, not me.
war_mckitten_H3: The world is cruel, sweet pup. It stops for no one.
war_mckitten_H4: [Your {PRONOUN/t_c/parent} seems to stiffen up, looking awfully uncomfortable.]
war_faith_H2: Oh, don't worry about the war!
I heard r_m got a promising prophecy from The Ascended, that's all I need to know we're in good hands.
war_faith_H3: Humf! l_n must be speaking to the Rot Wound to get these awful ideas during a time like this!
war_neuroticmate_H1: Be careful on your patrol, I have a bad feeling.
No-- yes, I know I say that every time but still! I have a bad feeling, I always have a bad feeling.
I just don't want you to get hurt.
war_neuroticmate_H2: You're going to be fine while I'm gone on patrol, right? Don't get too close to the border, make sure to stay in the dens, stay around r_w--
[You cut t_c off and tell {PRONOUN/t_c/object} that you'll be fine.]
Are you sure? Really sure? It's always nice to take precautions!
warfocus_SQ1: [t_c, crouched outside the nursery, has made {PRONOUN/t_c/self} even smaller than usual.]
[{PRONOUN/t_c/poss/CAP} eyes are wide as {PRONOUN/t_c/subject} {VERB/t_c/watch/watches} r_w reinforce the camp wall and l_n review battle plans.]
warfocus_SQ2: [t_c presses close to you, fidgeting with {PRONOUN/t_c/poss} tiny paws.]
The... The scary slugcats every slugcat's talking about? The ones they're fighting?
warfocus_SQ3: [Long after dusk, you're organizing your herbs in the clerics' den when you hear tiny paws at the entrance.]
[t_c creeps in, {PRONOUN/t_c/poss} eyes wide and fur fluffed. When {PRONOUN/t_c/subject} {VERB/t_c/see/sees} you, {PRONOUN/t_c/subject} {VERB/t_c/gasp/gasps}.]
I- I'm sorry! I know I'm not supposed to be here!
I c-couldn't sleep. I just wanted to ask...
...everycat's talking about the war, and they tell me that it'll be okay, and that The Ascended will protect us, but...
Y-you talk to The Ascended, right?
Are they really watching? Are they... are they really going to keep us safe?
warfocus_SQ4: [You hear a scuffle coming from inside the nursery. You peer inside to see t_c alone, swinging {PRONOUN/t_c/poss} little paws at empty air.]

[{PRONOUN/t_c/subject/CAP} {VERB/t_c/lunge/lunges} into the air, batting at nothing, but upon landing {PRONOUN/t_c/subject} {VERB/t_c/slip/slips} and {VERB/t_c/tumble/tumbles} unceremoniously in a ball of fluff.]
[For a moment, t_c lies still, sniffling. You pad into the nursery and ask if {PRONOUN/t_c/subject}{VERB/t_c/'re/'s} all right.]
[{PRONOUN/t_c/subject/CAP} {VERB/t_c/blink/blinks} up at you, then suddenly {VERB/t_c/burst/bursts} into tears.]
I- I'm trying to learn how to fight, s-so I can help! But I can't figure it out!
What if w_cClan attacks the camp? I want to be useful! I don't want to hide while everycat gets hurt!
[t_c buries {PRONOUN/t_c/poss} face in your side, wailing, as you try to calm {PRONOUN/t_c/object} down.]
warfocus_SQ5: [You suggest playing mossball with t_c, but {PRONOUN/t_c/subject} {VERB/t_c/shake/shakes} {PRONOUN/t_c/poss} head.]
Can we play hide-and-seek again? I wanna try out some new hiding spots.
If they're good, I can use them when... um, if w_cClan comes here.
warfocus_SQ6: [You're half asleep in the nursery when t_c's whisper wakes you up.]
If w_cClan comes here, you'll hide with me, right?
Please promise me you're not gonna try to fight!
warfocus_SQ7: I heard r_w saying something like, 'this war's gonna go on forever'.
Is... is that true? Is it never, ever going to end?
warfocus_SQ8: ...y_c? Could... could you teach me how to fight?
Just one move, in case w_cClan comes here, and every slugcat else is gone, and I hide but they find me, and...
[t_c starts sniffling. You quickly distract {PRONOUN/t_c/object} with a nearby feather.]
warfocus_SQ9: I had a dream last night where w_cClan was gone.
We didn't have to worry about anything anymore, so t_p took us just outside camp to show us a really pretty tree.
It was nice. I hope I have that dream again.
warfocus_SQ10: We don't have to worry about anything happening to t_p_positive, right?
Even with the war, {PRONOUN/t_p_positive/subject}{VERB/t_p_positive/'re/'s} gonna be okay, right?
warfocus_SQ11: [t_c has been especially quiet since the war started, so you put together a game to distract {PRONOUN/t_c/object}.]
[As {PRONOUN/t_c/subject} {VERB/t_c/dash/dashes} around the nursery, hunting for the colorful feathers you hid, you hear {PRONOUN/t_c/object} laugh for the first time in a while.]
warfocus_SQ12: [After overhearing l_n and d_n discussing the war, t_c has curled up in one corner of {PRONOUN/t_c/poss} den, not talking to anyone.]
[Your {PRONOUN/t_c/sibling}'s eyes are closed, but {PRONOUN/t_c/poss} ears prick at your approach.]
[You curl around {PRONOUN/t_c/object} and gently lick the top of {PRONOUN/t_c/poss} head, like y_p used to do when you were pups.]
[After a moment, you hear a weak giggle.]
neurotic_warfocus_SQ123: [It's midday, but you find y_c curled up in {PRONOUN/t_c/poss} nest. {PRONOUN/t_c/subject/CAP} {VERB/t_c/don't/doesn't} open {PRONOUN/t_c/poss} eyes when you approach.]
Hi, y_c. I'm not feeling great.
I'll be okay, and I don't want to bother r_m when {PRONOUN/r_m/subject}{VERB/r_m/'re/'s} so busy already.
I just... I'm thinking about the war, and everything that will happen before it's over...
...slugcats I care about being hurt, and fighting other slugcats for real...
...I'm so scared, y_c. I'm so scared, I feel sick.
war_focus_J1: [t_c notices you wandering close to the camp entrance and scoops you up, hastily dropping you closer to the nursery.]
Whoa, y_c! You can't be that close to the entrance. It's not safe.
There's bad guys out there. You have to stay inside so you can get big and strong to help us fight them, okay?
[You agree, and t_c heads off on a patrol. You can't wait to be like {PRONOUN/t_c/object} when you grow up!]
war_focus_J2: [You and t_c hobble back into camp after a skirmish on the border. You're not badly injured, just sore.]
Void, that was annoying. We can't simply go on a stroll anymore without an enemy patrol interrupting! Do they have infinite warriors to station at our borders, or something?
I need to grab some prey and lay in the sun for a bit. Wanna join me?
war_focus_assertive_AJ: If you ask me, this war couldn't have come soon enough! No other Clan disrespects c_nClan and gets away with it!
I think I'm gonna ask l_n about putting me on the front lines ... Just you wait, y_c! Those lousy w_cClan slugcats aren't gonna know what hit 'em!
war_focus_assertive1_AJ: Everybody around here talks about this war like it's some huge tragedy ... But I see it as an opportunity!
I've been waiting my whole life for the chance to show every slugcat in c_nClan what I'm really capable of!
Get ready, y_c, because my name's about to go down in history! 't_c, slayer of w_cClan!'
Heh ... Has a nice ring to it, doesn't it?
war_focus_assertive2_AJ: [t_c is battered and bruised, being tended to by a frantic r_m.]
Heh, don't worry ... You should see what the w_cClan warrior who did this to me looks like!
war_focus_AJ3: [t_c watches the clerics rush to tend to the recent border patrol, deeply troubled.]
Y'know, sometimes I wonder what our role is, in the midst of all this.
Why should we get to stay in camp all day while our Clanmates have to struggle and die on the front lines?
I get that what we do is important, but ... There's a war going on. Is it really more important than the lives of our Clanmates? It just seems a little unfair.
war_focus_AJ4: [Seems like even the pups aren't sheltered from the violence ...]
war_focus_AJ5: [Every time t_c leaves camp now, you say an extra prayer to The Ascended, terrified that this might be the time {PRONOUN/t_c/subject} won't make it back alive.]
war_focus_AJ6: [You rush to t_c as soon as {PRONOUN/t_c/subject}{VERB/t_c/'re/'s} back from patrol, pressing your nose into {PRONOUN/t_c/poss} pelt and pulling {PRONOUN/t_c/object} close to you.]
Tch ... I'm alright, y'know, y_c ... You don't have to do this every time. It's not like there are w_cClan warriors lurking everywhere I turn.
[Still, in the slight tremble in {PRONOUN/t_c/poss} voice, you can tell that {PRONOUN/t_c/subject} secretly {VERB/t_c/appreciate/appreciates} you worrying after {PRONOUN/t_c/object}.]
war_focus_assertive7_AJ: A day where I haven't taken down at least 3 w_cClanners, is a bad day for me. Hah!
war_focus_assertive8_AJ: [t_c and r_w are talking loudly in the middle of camp.]
Oh, hey, y_c! r_w and I were just talking about current events.
I bet half my freshkill that, by the end of the war, I'll have taken down more w_cClan warriors than they have.
You wanna get in on this? I'd be happy to go double or nothing!
war_focus_assertive9_AJ: Oh, hey, y_c! I was just practicing my war cry. Gotta be extra terrifying to go down in w_cClan legend, y'know?
war_focus_assertive10_AJ: [t_c is grinning ear to ear, looking as pleased as {PRONOUN/t_c/subject}{VERB/t_c/'ve/'s} ever been, like {PRONOUN/t_c/subject} could paw the white out of the moon.]
I just heard a rumor that the w_cClan cats have started using 'the fearsome t_c' as a nursery tale to scare their pups into sleeping ...
*Sniff* Ah, it's almost enough to bring a tear to my eye.
war_focus_AJ11~1: [t_c is arranging some things around {PRONOUN/t_c/poss} nest.]
Oh, hey, y_c! Come to admire my collection?
I like to keep little trophies from all of my past battles. Call me sentimental, but it helps me to remember what I'm fighting for.
Over there's the tooth r_m pulled out of my shoulder after I attacked that lizard on the border patrol. Void, they almost passed out on me!
And over there, next to it, is the collar I tore off that pet who was trespassing on our territory.
Ever since the war with w_cClan started, my collection's really expanded. But I'm not gonna stop until I run out of room!
Just imagine, a tuft of fur that I pulled off the leader of w_cClan personally ... That'd be the perfect thing to finish off my collection.
war_focus_AJ11~2: Hey, y_c, uh ... C-Could I talk to you for a second?
[t_c looks unusually uncertain and on-edge. You take {PRONOUN/t_c/object} to a private part of camp and ask what's wrong.]
I don't exactly know how to ... Uhm ...
... Today, there was a scrap at the border with w_cClan. Same as always.
And I was working through their warriors. Same as always.
There's this shout for help, and I look over and r_w has this apprentice on 'em.
I guess my instincts just took over. I pulled 'em off, and I swear, I didn't mean to be so rough, but then ...
I think the kid was seriously hurt.
But - But it's okay, isn't it? This is what I wanted, right? This is what I've been praying for.
All this time I've spent dreaming of the battlefield, of losing myself in the glory and exhilaration of bloodshed ...
I guess I just never pictured a kid's face on the other side of it all.
war_focus_AJ11~3: [t_c is staring at r_a dozing in front of the apprentice's den.]
Void, the apprentices sure look young, don't they ...?
If any slugcat were ever to lay a paw on them ...
[t_c bites the inside of {PRONOUN/t_c/poss} cheek and looks away, visions of the w_cClan apprentice undoubtedly flashing through {PRONOUN/t_c/poss} mind.]
war_focus_AJ11~4: [t_c is pondering {PRONOUN/t_c/poss} trophy collection, brow furrowed, tail flicking idly from side-to-side.]
[Gently, {PRONOUN/t_c/subject} {VERB/t_c/ghost/ghosts} {PRONOUN/t_c/poss} paw over a series of mementos from battles against w_cClan ... Teeth and broken spears, scraps of fur, trampled foliage.]
All of these used to belong to slugcats, once ...
If some w_cClan slugcat were to keep pieces of me in their nest to use as motivation, I'm not sure how I'd feel.
I guess I'd just wonder how they could be so blind.
I'm not just another faceless enemy, am I? I have real thoughts and feelings! I have a story! I feel pain!
Do the w_cClan slugcats really feel the same way, too ...?
The slugcats I took these from ... I wonder what their stories are like.
They'd probably have some pretty good ones to tell.
war_focus_AJ11~5: focus
connected
no_kit
they_leader
they_warrior
they_deputy
assertive
platonic_love
they_sameage
[You catch t_c slipping out of {PRONOUN/t_c/poss} den early one morning, carrying {PRONOUN/t_c/poss} w_cClan trophies outside of camp.]
Oh, hey, y_c ... I was just about to go bury this stuff. Wanna help me?
[The two of you pad out into the dewy, springy air, wrapped in a pleasant, ponderous silence.]
[t_c selects a private spot near the border to bury {PRONOUN/t_c/poss} things, and hollows out a small hole in the earth with {PRONOUN/t_c/poss} paw, then carefully places everything inside.]
[{PRONOUN/t_c/subject/CAP} {VERB/t_c/pause/pauses} at a small tuft of black-and-white fur, hovering over it with {PRONOUN/t_c/poss} paw.]
Y'know, I remember every warrior I've ever fought. This one was a real tough fight. It was a senior warrior of w_cClan, I think. Void, she was fierce.
I think the two of us had a lot in common. Maybe, if she were born just a few tail-lengths across the border, we could've been best friends.
... I really wish I didn't feel this way, y_c. Things were so much less confusing back when I just saw every slugcat in w_cClan as nothing more than an enemy.
But, things were also harder, too. My world felt a lot smaller.
I wonder where that slugcat is now ...
[t_c's gaze trails sideways across the border, fixated on the rising sun, washing the world in an anxious, watery light. Another day of fighting is about to begin.]
[With a deep breath, {PRONOUN/t_c/subject} {VERB/t_c/push/pushes} the tuft of fur into the hole and {VERB/t_c/cover/covers} it with a thin layer of soil, never again to resurface.]
war_focus_AJ12: [t_c is telling war stories to lift everycat's spirits.]
So there I was, backed into a corner -- sheer fifteen lizard-length drop in front of me, legion of w_cClan warriors behind.
I thought for sure that I was toast. Even started praying to my warrior ancestors for help.
But then, just in the nick of time, who comes to my rescue but our very own r_w?
[The other warriors laugh and jostle r_w's shoulders, teasing that {PRONOUN/t_c/subject} should've left t_c to die if {PRONOUN/t_c/subject} knew what was good for {PRONOUN/t_c/object}.]
Ahaha, okay, okay! My stories aren't so boring, you know.
Oh, hey, y_c! Wanna get in on this? I was just about to start the tale of how I tricked a w_cClan warrior into thinking I was a pet!
war_focus_AJ13: Oh, hey, y_c! You're looking a little faint; have you eaten anything yet today?
We all have to stay strong, if we wanna show w_cClan what's what!
war_focus_AJ14: [t_c looks across the groups of warriors, boasting and sharing stories, with a slightly sad expression.]
Do you ever feel like some inextricable part of our identities is being lost in all of this ...?
We used to be artists, dreamers, children and parents. We used to be individuals.
Now it's like we're just faceless weapons, waiting to be used and thrown away. Nothing matters except fighting w_cClan anymore.
y_c, promise me that, no matter what happens, you'll never let this war make you forget who you are.
You're so much more than just an instrument for violence ... No matter what some slugcats might lead you to believe.
war_focus_AJ15: [t_c scans the barren branches above camp, deeply saddened.]
It seems even the noodleflies have been scared off by the fighting ...
war_focus_AJ16: [t_c's gaze is fixed on a small flower that had been growing in the camp entrance, now trampled and flattened by the border patrol.]
Can any beauty truly exist in the face of all this violence?
war_focus_AJ17: [The prey pile has been looking a little scarce lately, what with so many warriors out to battle.]
[But t_c, the Clan's best hunter, has been working {PRONOUN/t_c/self} to the point of exhaustion to ensure that the Clan is fed.]

[{PRONOUN/t_c/subject/CAP} may not know the fame and glory of battle, but as {PRONOUN/t_c/subject} {VERB/t_c/add/adds} five birds to the dwindling freshkill pile, you hope that t_c knows just how essential and valued {PRONOUN/t_c/poss} contributions really are.]
war_focus_AJ18: [A w_cClan warrior scraped you up a little on border patrol; nothing major, but still a bit scary-looking.]
[When you re-enter camp for the first time and t_c sees you, {PRONOUN/t_c/subject} {VERB/t_c/freeze/freezes}, eyes wide.]
What happened? Who did this to you?
I swear to the Void, y_c, if this gets any worse ... All of w_cClan is going to have me to answer to.
war_focus_AJ19: So ... I guess we should talk about it.
What's gonna happen if one of us doesn't make it out the other side of this.
... y_c, if anything happens to me -- and I'm not saying it will, but if it does ...
... I need you to promise me that you'll keep on living.
Don't let yourself become blinded by hatred or revenge. You have such a bright future ahead of you. The last thing I want is for you to throw all that away.
I know it will be hard, but ... I won't know any peace unless I'm sure you'll be okay.
war_focus_AJ202: [You rouse t_c from {PRONOUN/t_c/poss} sleep in the middle of the night.]
What is it? You had a nightmare?
[t_c opens {PRONOUN/t_c/poss} arms and you crawl into {PRONOUN/t_c/poss} nest, enveloped by {PRONOUN/t_c/object}, shielded from the cold by {PRONOUN/t_c/poss} fur.]
I know the war is scary ... But I'm not going to let anything happen to you.
Nothing's gonna hurt you on my watch. I'm here. You don't have to be afraid.
war_focus_AJ21: [t_c casts a nervous glance towards the camp entrance.]
I hope we'll have enough for every slugcat.
war_focus_AJ22: [t_c is teaching the pups defense tactics in case of a w_cClan invasion.]
And if a w_cClan warrior makes it into the nursery, what should you do?
That's right, r_k! You should make yourself small. Can you all make yourself small for me?
[The pups all crouch and huddle, giggling with glee, as t_c's smile grows increasingly strained.]
war_focus_AJ23: It isn't fair! Why do we hafta sit around the nursery all day while the grownups get to go out and fight?
Everybody talks about pups like we're just helpless fluff balls ... But I'm not scared of w_cClan! I know I can fight!
If only we were apprentices already ...

intro: [t_c watches the camp entrance with a troubled expression.]
Mediators ... We're not supposed to play favorites with any one Clan. Every slugcat's needs must be taken into account, especially in times like this.
But c_nClan is my home. My friends, my family, my entire life is here. How am I supposed to make a decision that could hurt the ones I love? After all that w_cClan has done?

choice2.text: Stay loyal to your own Clan.

duty: Don't you think I know that?
When I signed up to be a mediator, I knew what it would entail ...
I just never expected it to be this hard.
loyal: Do you really think that's right? To throw away everything it means to be a mediator for my own personal benefit?
It might work for now ... But I'll have The Ascended to answer to in the long run.
Still, at this point, I would do anything to stop this war.
sympathy: Hard doesn't even begin to describe it ...
[t_c scoots closer to you, pressing {PRONOUN/t_c/poss} side into your fur.]
I just don't know what to do anymore, y_c.
All I want is to take away every slugcat's pain. All the suffering our Clanmates have endured at the paws of w_cClan ... How much more can this community take?
It's my job to maintain peace. To stop the war. But everything I ever learned in my training has failed. Logic has failed us. Reason has failed us.
Well, I just don't know what to think about the Ascended anymore.
I'm just tired. I want it to be over ...
[t_c sighs, burying {PRONOUN/t_c/poss} head into your pelt as if {PRONOUN/t_c/subject} can hide away there forever.]

war_focus_AJ25: Y'know, they say war is never pretty ... But clearly, whoever said that never met me, 'cause I think I look great!
[t_c strikes a dramatic pose, grinning at the sound of your laugh.]
war_focus_AJ251: Doesn't d_n know what {PRONOUN/d_n/subject}{VERB/d_n/'re/'s} risking by putting me on the border patrol?
How ever will the brave little soldiers of c_nClan get by without my beautiful face as moral support?~
war_focus_AJ26: I overheard r_w comparing w_cClan to a bunch of monsters earlier. Couldn't believe my ears. I mean, are we all still in the nursery?
They're not monsters. They're just a bunch of sorry scraps of fur, as pathetic and desperate as the rest of us.
I'm sure they don't want to march out there getting killed any more than we do.
And I know I really don't want to.

intro: Everybody sure is eager to go marching to their deaths ...
You and me, though, we're too smart for that. Aren't we, y_c?
object: [You puff your chest out and tell t_c that you'd gladly die for your Clan.]
Hey, more power to ya. I have no problem with slugcats who got a death wish.
Maybe I'll tell d_n that you can take my spot on the next border patrol. Since you're so desperate to prove yourself to slugcats who couldn't care a wit either way.
agree: Heh. I knew it. Another free thinker.
Or, maybe just another coward. Really, who's to say?
Hey, wanna cut the next border patrol with me? I've been faking sick since I was in the nursery ... Maybe you could use a few pointers.

war_focus_AJ28: [After coming down with a slight cold, you beg your mentor to let you skip the border patrol, afraid of infecting any of the warriors with your sickness.]
[Just as m_n tells you that having the sniffles is no excuse to get out of your duties, t_c steps in.]

This slugcat is young, and sick. {PRONOUN/y_c/subject/CAP} {VERB/y_c/have/has} no business being on the front lines. What type of warrior would I be if I allowed {PRONOUN/y_c/object} to go in my stead?
[Just as you begin to stammer out your thanks, t_c silences you with a flick of {PRONOUN/t_c/poss} tail.]
Don't get used to it. Just focus on getting well.

[t_c looks down at the border bitterly.]
... Y'know, this is where it happened.
d_n really should've listened to me when I told {PRONOUN/d_n/object} I wasn't good to patrol. At the first sign of fighting, I dashed right up this tree like an apprentice dodging leech duty.
Even as slugcats were dying ... Even as I heard my Clanmates' cries for help ... Right here is where I stayed.
I'm not an idiot. I know I'm no saint.
But, my whole life, I always thought the selfish, manipulative jerk was just a costume I was wearing to protect myself. I thought I'd be able to show up for others when it really mattered.
But ... I guess it isn't true. That selfish, manipulative jerk is just really who I am. There is no costume anymore.
